name.description: The first name(s) of the national ID holder, including any title.

last_name.description: The last name(s) or surname of the national ID holder.

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the national ID holder in YYYY-MM-DD format.

address.description: The residential address of the national ID holder in English. If it is in other language just output None data type.

date_of_issue.description: The date when the national ID was issued in YYYY-MM-DD format.

date_of_expiry.description: The date when the national ID expires in YYYY-MM-DD format.
